articles.title: COP15: Fulfil $19bn pledge to reduce migration to Europe, Buhari tells development partners - TheCable
articles.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has asked the World Bank, African Development Bank (AfDB) and other international development partners to activate the $19 billion pledge under the One Planet Summit initiative.  The

articles.title: Wall Street set to open higher, oil prices extend losses - Reuters
articles.description: European stock indexes rose on Tuesday as risk appetite showed some signs of picking up again after Monday's sharp falls, but fears over economic growth still weighed on markets, pushing oil prices lower.
articles.content: LONDON, May 10 (Reuters) - European stock indexes rose on Tuesday as risk appetite showed some signs of picking up again after Monday's sharp falls, but fears over economic growth still weighed on ma… [+3173 chars]

articles.title: Loneliness during COVID increased by 5% across Global North - Open Access Government
articles.description: The data, looking at loneliness during COVID in North America and Europe, finds "the pandemic does appear to have increased loneliness"
articles.content:
The findings, published in the American Psychologist, suggests that loneliness during COVID significantly increased across North America and Europe.
